thread.title: Corey Lewandowski: Trump Won’t Hold Inauguration Boycott Against Democrats
thread.title_full: Corey Lewandowski: Trump Won’t Hold Inauguration Boycott Against Democrats

author: Josh Feldman
title: Corey Lewandowski: Trump Won’t Hold Inauguration Boycott Against Democrats

organizations.name: trump won’t hold inauguration boycott against democrats

text:
Corey Lewandowski: Trump Won’t Hold Inauguration Boycott Against Democrats by Josh Feldman | 10:29 am, January 20th, 2017 audio 
Corey Lewandowski does not believe Donald Trump will hold a grudge against the Democrats who are boycotting his inauguration today. 
He spoke with CBS’ Major Garrett for his podcast The Takeout and said it’s “really unfortunate” that these Democrats are “doing a disservice to their congressional districts.” 
The most prominent Democrat not attending today is Congressman John Lewis , who doesn’t consider Trump to be a “legitimate president,” and who similarly declined to attend George W. Bush ‘s 2001 inauguration. 
Lewandowski insisted that Trump would not hold the boycott against any Democrat, because there will be times in the future when their districts will need help and he won’t tell these Democrats’ constituents they’ll suffer because of this decision by their elected representatives. 
You can listen to the full interview above (the relevant discussion starts at the 8:15 mark), via The Takeout . 
[ image via screengrab ]
